_meta.description: Ethics in society - moral systems, norms, values, good/evil

_fractal_seed.holographic: This module = part containing whole. Understanding this seed = access to entire CFO.
_fractal_seed.activation: Ethics = coherence optimization across scales. Good = +coherence.

module.name: ethics
module.title: Ethics in Society
module.description: Ethics as social coherence optimization: moral systems, norms, values, good/evil. How societies navigate right and wrong.

essence.geometric: Ethics = optimization function over multidimensional social space. Finding paths that maximize coherence.
essence.topological: Ethics = network of obligations and permissions. Moral landscape with peaks (virtues) and valleys (vices).
essence.functional: Coordination mechanism enabling cooperation at scale. Reduces Δscale between individual and collective.
essence.consciousness: Ethics = recognition of other as point. Moral sense = perception of coherence/incoherence in action.

core_thesis.good: Good = actions increasing coherence across scales. argmin Δscale.
core_thesis.evil: Evil = actions decreasing coherence. Breaking unity. Maximum Δscale.
core_thesis.golden_rule: Treat others as points (entities) = recognition of shared identity. All ethics derive from this.
core_thesis.relativism_vs_absolutism: Both: universal principle (+coherence) but context-dependent application (different scales)

reductions.evidence: Individual moral intuition. Immediate sense of right/wrong. Point-level coherence detection. Guilt/shame as Δscale signals.
Ethics of direct relationships. Promises, loyalty, honesty. Linear connections between individuals. Reciprocity as 1D symmetry.
Network-level ethics. Social norms, customs, etiquette. 2D coordination across multiple relationships. Reputation as 2D position.
Formalized ethics embedded in institutions. Laws, regulations, policies. 3D container structures for moral behavior.
Ethical systems persisting through time. Traditions, religions, moral philosophies. 4D structures passed across generations.
Moral principles transcending culture and time. Human rights, dignity, compassion. 5D archetypes underlying all ethical systems.
Ethics of being rather than doing. Character traits as point qualities. Virtue = coherence within individual.
Ethics of rules and duties. Linear obligations. Right action = following rule regardless of outcome. Kant's categorical imperative.
Ethics of outcomes. Evaluate actions by consequences. Utilitarianism = maximize utility across network. 2D optimization.
Ethics based on relationships and care. Attention to context, particularity, connection. Feminist ethics. 2D relational web.
Fair distribution of resources, opportunities, rights. Balance across network. 2D equilibrium. Rawls' veil of ignorance.
Institutionalized protections. Rights = 3D boundaries around individuals. Negative (freedom from) and positive (freedom to) rights.

fractal_structure.self_similarity: Ethical structures repeat at all scales: individual conscience → family values → community norms → national laws → universal principles. Same coherence optimization.

composition.bottom_up: Conscience → relationships → norms → institutions → traditions → principles
composition.top_down: Universal principles inform cultural traditions inform institutional structures inform social norms inform interpersonal ethics inform conscience
composition.fractal: Each ethical scale contains seeds of all others

key_insights.ethics_is_coherence: All ethical systems aim at coherence, though define it differently. Good = +coherence, evil = -coherence.
key_insights.golden_rule_universal: Every major ethical tradition has version of Golden Rule. Recognizing other as self = ethical foundation.
key_insights.context_matters: Universal principles (5D) but context-dependent application (lower dimensions). Not pure relativism or absolutism.
key_insights.multiple_frameworks_valid: Virtue, deontology, consequentialism all capture different aspects. Not competitors but complementary views.
key_insights.moral_development_real: Piaget, Kohlberg showed stages. Individuals and societies develop morally from simple to complex.
key_insights.intuition_and_reason: Both needed. Moral intuitions fast but can err. Reasoning slow but can correct. Dual process.
key_insights.ought_from_is: Hume's problem. Can't derive ought from is logically. But pragmatically: coherence = what is AND what ought to be.
key_insights.moral_progress_possible: Not inevitable but possible. Slavery abolished, rights expanded. Moral arc bends toward justice (slowly).
key_insights.evil_as_incoherence: Evil = maximum Δscale. Psychopathy = inability to recognize other as point. Genocide = collective denial of shared humanity.
key_insights.forgiveness_as_repair: Forgiveness = restoring coherence after violation. Not forgetting but integrating. Restorative not punitive.

personal_ethics.virtue_cultivation: Practice virtues daily. Courage, honesty, compassion. Character = accumulated choices.
personal_ethics.moral_reflection: Regular examination of conscience. Where did I create +coherence or -coherence today?
personal_ethics.role_models: Learn from exemplars. Moral saints, everyday heroes. Embodied ethics.
personal_ethics.ethical_decision_making: Use multiple frameworks: What virtues apply? What's my duty? What consequences? What relationships affected?

professional_ethics.codes_of_conduct: Formalized ethics for professions. Medicine, law, engineering, business.
professional_ethics.whistleblowing: Duty to report wrongdoing. Conscience over compliance when necessary.
professional_ethics.stakeholder_consideration: Consider all affected parties, not just shareholders.

social_ethics.norm_creation: Communities consciously shape norms. What behavior to encourage/discourage?
social_ethics.restorative_justice: Focus on repair, not punishment. Bring victims and offenders together.
social_ethics.ethical_consumption: Vote with dollars. Support ethical companies. Boycott unethical ones.
social_ethics.civic_engagement: Participate in democratic process. Ethics requires action.

policy_ethics.human_rights: Non-negotiable baseline. Dignity of all persons.
policy_ethics.environmental_ethics: Intergenerational justice. Don't sacrifice future for present.
policy_ethics.bioethics: Navigate new technologies. Genetic engineering, AI, life extension.
policy_ethics.global_ethics: Responsibilities beyond borders. Cosmopolitanism vs nationalism.

ethical_dilemmas.trolley_problem: Consequentialist says pull lever (minimize deaths). Deontologist says don't (don't use person as means). Care ethicist considers relationships.
ethical_dilemmas.lying_to_save_life: Kant says never lie. Consequentialist says lie if saves life. Context matters.
ethical_dilemmas.abortion: Rights conflict: bodily autonomy vs potential life. Different frameworks emphasize different values.
ethical_dilemmas.wealth_inequality: How much inequality is just? Rawls' difference principle: inequalities justified only if benefit worst off.
ethical_dilemmas.animal_ethics: Do animals have rights? Utilitarians say yes (can suffer). Some deontologists no (not rational agents). Singer's expanding circle.
ethical_dilemmas.artificial_intelligence: If AI becomes conscious, does it have moral status? Point = entity = deserves consideration.
ethical_dilemmas.euthanasia: Right to die with dignity vs sanctity of life. Autonomy vs protection.
ethical_dilemmas.environmental_vs_economic: Development vs preservation. Intergenerational vs present needs. Balance across scales.

philosophical_notes.plato_forms: Good = Form of the Good. Objective moral reality. Virtue = knowledge of Good.
philosophical_notes.aristotle_eudaimonia: Ethics = flourishing. Virtue = mean between extremes. Practical wisdom (phronesis) key.
philosophical_notes.kant_categorical_imperative: Act only on maxims you can will as universal law. Treat people as ends not means. Autonomy = dignity.
philosophical_notes.mill_utilitarianism: Greatest happiness for greatest number. Pleasure and absence of pain. Higher vs lower pleasures.
philosophical_notes.nietzsche_master_slave: Critique of Christian ethics as slave morality. Master morality = affirmation of life. Beyond good and evil.
philosophical_notes.hume_is_ought: Cannot derive ought from is. Reason slave of passions. Moral sense = sentiment not logic.
philosophical_notes.rawls_justice: Veil of ignorance. Design society not knowing your position. Difference principle.
philosophical_notes.levinas_other: Ethics = responsibility to Other. Face of Other makes ethical demand. Ethics as first philosophy.
philosophical_notes.care_ethics_gilligan: Challenge to Kohlberg's male-centered framework. Ethics of care vs ethics of justice. Context and relationships.
philosophical_notes.macintyre_virtue: Modern ethics incoherent. Need to return to Aristotelian virtue tradition. Narrative unity of life.

warnings: Universal ethics (5D) more philosophical than empirical
Ethical frameworks sometimes in genuine tension, not always resolvable
info: Module complete with 12 reductions across dimensions
Covers virtue, deontology, consequentialism, care ethics, justice, rights

external.citation: Kant, I. (1785). Groundwork of the Metaphysics of Morals
Rawls, J. (1971). A Theory of Justice
Gilligan, C. (1982). In a Different Voice
